entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. He is described as having a warm glow at the sight of his friends, but then feeling uneasy and wanting them to leave him alone. (Excerpt: "The warm glow that had flared in side him at the sight of his two best friends was extinguished...")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's best friends, referred to as 'he' and 'him'. He is mentioned as being present with Hermione. (Excerpt: "Ron began.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's best friends, referred to as 'she' and 'her'. She is mentioned as being present with Ron. (Excerpt: "Hermione rather breathlessly said.")

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, mentioned as being stroked by Harry in a strained silence. (Excerpt: "He stroked Hedwig automatically, not looking at either of the others.")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person mentioned as having made a decision about Harry's safety. (Excerpt: "‘He seemed to think it was best,’ said Hermione rather breathlessly. ‘Dumbledore, I mean.’")

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: A group of people mentioned as being related to Harry's safety. (Excerpt: "I think he thought you were safest with the Muggles —"
